tool_description: Use AI to convert jpg to svg. Double your photo's resolution. Remove photo background with a click!
name: Photo Bear
title: Photo Bear

api_list.name: Remove Background: set background to white/transparent
api_list.description: Remove the background from the photo and keep only the main object/person in the image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://photo-bear.p.rapidapi.com/submit-photo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "photo-bear.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Vectorize Photo: convert image to svg
api_list.description: Convert an image (like jpg, png,) to vector format (svg).

api_list.name: Super resolution: double photo resolution
api_list.description: Uses AI to increase photo resolution and add fine details to the image. Allows amazing zoom without introducing blur.
